Justia Lawyer Rating and Reviews

Featured Lawyer

Alexander Limontes

INDIANAPOLIS, IN

Each month, we are featuring a Justia Connect member who has achieved a perfect 10 Justia Lawyer Rating!

Justia Lawyer Rating and Reviews is a system designed to allow lawyers to share valuable insight from peers and colleagues personally familiar with that lawyerâ€™s work. Lawyers who have been reviewed by their peers receive a Justia Lawyer Rating, which is a numerical representation of these peer reviews.

These lawyers also earn the Justia Lawyer Rating Badge to display on their Justia Lawyer Directory profile and other marketing materials, such as websites and blogs. Our research shows that the Justia Lawyer Rating Badge is even the most frequently used search filter in the Justia Lawyer Directory.!

JurisPro Expert Witness Directory

JurisPro provides a free directory of expert witnesses in over 10,000 areas of expertise.

Forensic Accounting Expert Witness Testimony Excluded in Hotel Litigation

Forensic Accounting Expert Witness testimony not allowed as the court opined that the expert did not have first-hand knowledge of the case at hand.

Psychology Expert Witness Testimony Allowed in Employment Litigation

A Psychology Expert Witness was allowed to testify despite not remembering details about the plaintiff's examination.

Accident Reconstruction Expert Witness Testimony Allowed in Insurance Breach of Contract Case

The court allowed the defendant's Accident Reconstruction Expert Witness to testify in a bad faith insurance case.

Geology Expert Witness Testimony Excluded in Groundwater Contamination Litigation

A Geology Expert Witness was excluded as the court found his conclusions were "just guesses."
